languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля скорбно хрипит:{/n} "Дух сей машины разгневан и не желает более исполнять функцию. Я позабочусь, чтобы прислуживавшим ему нечестивцам была назначена серво-епитимья".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля скорбно хрипит:{/n} "Дух сей машины разгневан и не желает более исполнять функцию. Я позабочусь, чтобы прислуживавшим ему нечестивцам была назначена серво-епитимья".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля скорбно хрипит:{/n} "Дух сей машины разгневан и не желает более исполнять функцию. Я позабочусь, чтобы прислуживавшим ему нечестивцам была назначена серво-епитимья".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal's vox rasps tragically,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners who attended to it are marked for servo-penance."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが嘆くような音を出した。{/n}「この機体の精霊は憤慨していて、これ以上動くつもりもないようだ。メンテナンスの責任を負っていたであろう不敬者たちが適切な処罰を受けるように手配しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが嘆くような音を出した。{/n}「この機体の精霊は憤慨していて、これ以上動くつもりもないようだ。メンテナンスの責任を負っていたであろう不敬者たちが適切な処罰を受けるように手配しましょう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了悲伤的喘息。{/n}“机魂被激怒了，不再愿意效力。我一定要让那些负责维修的违规之人接受伺服惩戒。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了悲伤的喘息。{/n}“机魂被激怒了，不再愿意效力。我一定要让那些负责维修的违规之人接受伺服惩戒。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal jadea, pesaroso:{/n} «El espíritu de esta máquina está furioso y se niega a funcionar. Me encargaré de que los profanadores responsables de su mantenimiento reciban la servopenitencia adecuada».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal jadea, pesaroso:{/n} «El espíritu de esta máquina está furioso y se niega a funcionar. Me encargaré de que los profanadores responsables de su mantenimiento reciban la servopenitencia adecuada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un sifflement de chagrin :{/n}« L'esprit de cette machine est furieux et n'assurera plus sa fonction. Je veillerai à ce que les profanateurs responsables de sa maintenance subissent une servopénitence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un sifflement de chagrin :{/n}« L'esprit de cette machine est furieux et n'assurera plus sa fonction. Je veillerai à ce que les profanateurs responsables de sa maintenance subissent une servopénitence. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox ächzt traurig.{/n} "Der Geist dieser Maschine ist erzürnt und wird seine Funktion nicht mehr erfüllen. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die für ihre Wartung zuständigen Profaner eine Servostrafe erhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox ächzt traurig.{/n} "Der Geist dieser Maschine ist erzürnt und wird seine Funktion nicht mehr erfüllen. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die für ihre Wartung zuständigen Profaner eine Servostrafe erhalten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu hüzünle vızıldıyor.{/n} "Bu makinenin ruhu öyle öfkeli ki artık işlevini yerine getirmeye gönlü yok. Bakımından sorumlu günahkârların hizmecezaya çarptırılması boynumun borcudur."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox wheezes mournfully,{/n} "The spirit of this machine is enraged and will perform its function no more. I will see to it that the profaners responsible for its maintenance are marked for servo-penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu üzüntüyle vızıldıyor:{/n} "Bu makinein ruhu öfkeli ve fonksiyonunu artık yerine getirmiyor. Bakımından sorumlu günahkârların servolaştırma cezasına çarptırılmalarını sağlayacağım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
